Windows 7/Visual Studio 2008/Cassini/Firefox Performance Problem

Posted on 14 Jan 2010 Just a quick note for myself (and also for those of you who might be looking for a solution to a frustrating problem): If you are developing with the Cassini web server on Windows 7 and notice *major performance problems when using Firefox to load the local site, try out this fix. It worked for me! http://joshclose.net/?tag=cassini EDIT: The link above is down at the moment. Here are the instructions:
  1. Open Firefox and type "about:config" in the address bar.
  2. Use the textbox at the top to filter on "v6."
  3. Double-click on the "ipv6" setting.
